feed.title: Some Day Peg: A crazy two-way peg bridging BTC to other chains Raw

entry.title: Some Day Peg: A crazy two-way peg bridging BTC to other chains Raw
entry.summary: Hi all,Robin shared an interesting and lighthearted attempt to implement a two-way peg in Bitcoin Script. You can check out the code on GitHub using the following link: https://gist.github.com/RobinLinus/1102fce176f3b5466180addac5d26313.This implementation is not meant to be taken seriously, but it offers a fun exploration of how a two-way peg could be implemented in Bitcoin Script.
